start-python-debugger.description: Start python debugger at beginning of main().

include-citations.description: At end of simulation, display information on how to cite PyLith and components used.

dry.description: prints the command line and exits

nodelist.description: a comma-separated list of machine names in square brackets (e.g., [101-103,105,107])

nodegen.description: a printf-style format string, used in conjunction with 'nodelist' to generate the list of machine names (e.g., "n%03d")

dump_parameters.description: Dump parameters used and version information to file.
dump_parameters.name: dumpparamters

indent.description: Nmber of spaces to indent, use a negative number for no newlines.

filename.description: Name of file written with parameters.

mesh_generator.description: Generates or imports the computational mesh.

use_fault_mesh.description: If true, use fault mesh to define fault; otherwise, use group of vertices to define fault.

up_dir.description: Up-dip or up direction (perpendicular to along-strike and not collinear with fault normal; applies to fault surfaces in 2-D and 3-D).

open_free_surface.description: If True, enforce traction free surface when the fault opens, otherwise use initial tractions even when the fault opens.

zero_tolerance_normal.description: Tolerance for suppressing near zero values of fault opening.

fault_mesh_filename.description: Filename for fault mesh UCD file.

id.description: Fault identifier (must be unique across all faults and materials).

use_cuda.description: Enable use of CUDA for finite-element integrations.

create_null_space.description: Create solution null space. Changing this setting should only be necessary for test problems with fewer DOF than the null space.

split_fields.description: Split solution fields into displacements and Lagrange multipliers for separate preconditioning.

use_custom_constraint_pc.description: Use custom preconditioner for Lagrange constraints.

view_jacobian.description: Write Jacobian matrix to binary file.

t_units.description: Units for simulation time in output.

elastic_prestep.description: Include a static calculation with elastic behavior before time stepping.
